item.title: Not just another privacy box funded by Indigogo or Kickstarter. We are absolutely free and opensource. Simply subscribe to one of our trusted VPN providers. Constantly reviewing security standards to ensure your privacy is our main goal.
item.description:
Not just another privacy box funded by Indigogo or Kickstarter. We are absolutely free and opensource. Simply subscribe to one of our trusted VPN providers. Constantly reviewing security standards to ensure your privacy is our main goal.

,

item.title: Bunkersuites Privacy Box Facts
item.description:
Bunkersuites Privacy Box Facts

,,
  • Affordable and proven anonymisation of your Internet identity
  • Currently supported VPN provider (minimum one account is required): Cyberghost (legal entity in Romania and active secure VPN servers all over the world)
  • A simple browser interface allows you to enter your VPN credentials and choose your desired location. And off you go!
  • No need to install a software or app on your devices. Simply connect Wifi “securewifi”
  • 256bit encryption (Openvpn Technology) helps you to keep ALL your Internet traffic private right from the start
  • Using standard DHCP (dynamic IP addresses) and standard SSL TCP ports for tunneling allows our box to work in almost every setup
  • Unblocks your desired websites such as Sky Go, Gmail, vimeo.com, dailymotion.com, gist.github.com, weebly.com, many adult websites etc. in most affected rogue states
  • No more letters from lawyers or government institutions due to copyright violations, etc. Your downloads are no longer included in any logging mechanisms. Our VPN partners and Bunkersuites saves NO log-files
  • Easily turn on a website filter to block malicious content (Cyberghost Premium)
  • We’re constantly improving our privacy box. We maintain a long list of additional planned features and your feature requests can be part of it!
  • Quarterly release cycle with a planned online update feature
,

item.title: All in one easy-to-use privacy box - How do I install it?
item.description:
All in one easy-to-use privacy box - How do I install it?

,,
  1. Purchase your own Raspberry Pi 3 set including a 16GB SD card and a 3A AC adapter (do not use a weak mobile / cell phone charger instead!) to meet our minimum hardware requirements.
  2. Shop with us below! Go and help us funding our project. It will mean a lot to us and is easy for you. Our Amazon vendors are approved and tested. Start building your own affordable VPN privacy box as fast as your delivery men can run! Visit our equipment section below.
  3. Download our latest customised Raspbian Jessie image below. It is not a standard Raspbian image hence should only be downloaded from our download repositories. It is made to run seamlessly on Raspberry Pi 3.
  4. Flash your Micro SD card with Etcher or follow the section “Writing an image to the SD card” on the official Raspberry Pi page here.
  5. Connect your Internet router with a CAT5 network cable to your Pi’s network card.
  6. Insert the SD Card into your Raspberry and power it on by connecting the 3A AC adapter.
  7. Connect to the wireless network “securewifi”. Default Wifi Password: r2d2secure
  8. On your Laptop or Smartphone open a browser and access the website https://10.11.12.1
  9. Confirm any certificate error (it is a self signed certificate and your browser may complain. Nevertheless it is still secure to proceed.)
  10. Login with the default Web GUI credentials. Username: pi Password: raspberry
  11. Change your Web GUI password under “Options”. Change your Wifi password under “WiFi Setup”. Make sure you remember them!
  12. Create your own Cyberghost account here.
  13. Create your personalized Cyber Ghost VPN user and password (required user to connect your privacy box under “VPN Setup”). With Cyber Ghost Premium Plus you can run up to 5 VPN users in parallel. Each privacy box requires one user only. Simply follow our step-by-step guide how to create a single user / password below.
  14. Once done fill in your Cyber Ghost account details under “VPN Setup” on the privacy box GUI. Choose your server you’d like to connect to and scroll down to the user form to fill-in your CyberGhost username and password details via copy and paste.
  15. Voilà! You are now surfing securely. Make sure you stay connected to “securewifi” at all times.
,

Currently supported Hardware: Raspberry Pi 3. Banana Pi support discontinued.
Please report any possible bugs and behaviors over our contact form below.

,Raspberry Pi 2 & 3 v.2.0.8 Download (01.02.18),

Currently found bugs. To be corrected in the upcoming release:

,
  1. Rarely VPN is not connecting automatically after reboot and “VPN connect” needs to be commenced manually
  2. Help us testing to improve!

item.title: Tailored VPN solutions securely connecting branches and remote sites.
item.description:
Tailored VPN solutions securely connecting branches and remote sites.

,,

Free Internet is more and more controlled by a monopoly of providers restricting bandwith and services on demand. Our Bunkersuites corporate VPN solutions allow you to tunnel traffic that would otherwise not be allowed or somehow filtered. Wireless broadband connections are usually restricted and do not allow inbound server traffic to be accessed via VPN or Citrix / Remote Desktop. Yet for companies with many smaller branches it is now possible to use affordable Wimax, UMTS and LTE bandwith technology with dynamic IP addresses. Bunkersuites box will allow you to route all kinds of internet traffic inbound and outbound through any standard broadband line with our affordable customised VPN box. Firewalling, routing, VPNing. It’s all included in one lean power saving box connecting to a datacenter Linux VM of your choice to establish an alternative routing via static public IP address. Request a quote if you wish us to configure a server solution with your individual setup on Linode VM or DE-CIX Internet Exchange server. More info on our partner website Linode.

,

Bunkersuites Corporate VPN Product Facts:

,
  • Provides a cost saving Raspberry or Banana Pi for each small branch office. Larger branches can be secured by any other Firewall make if required. As a certified Sophos partner we will be able to provide expertise and support on Sophos XG and Sophos UTM.
  • Connects your Raspberry to one or several central VPN servers
  • Routes traffic bi-directional from and to each branch office
  • Paket filtering your traffic to enhance security levels and create gate keepers
  • We offer individual remote support and monitoring capabilities. Our experts are located in Cayman Islands (EST time zone) and Europe (CET time zone)
  • As a Sophos Security Partner we are able to include modular security levels and features. Learn more at Sophos
,,,

item.title: Privacy for a freer world
item.description:
Privacy for a freer world

,

If you live, work or spend time in one of the “not so” free-speech and free-press states it’s extremely likely to become a subject of surveillance. Interception, lawful or unlawful is a path to limit civil rights. Our free Bunkersuites privacy box helps you to stay out of interception from government and non-government institutions. Join our free community now and follow how to build your own Bunkersuites box to stay safe!

,,,,

item.title: We need to talk about the internet - Internet Citizen
item.description:
We need to talk about the internet - Internet Citizen

When we didn't all have tiny supercomputers in our pockets, it felt a lot easier to draw the line between "irl" and url. Tomorrow, it's not clear if that line will even exist. The issues changing the internet are the issues changing the country, and the world.
